entry.title: Looking for fanfiction
entry.summary:
Author: MaryKom

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 208Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 0

Summary: I promise to delete it as soon as I find the fanfiction English is not my native language, so I'm using a translator. Please forgive my grammar mistakes. 1. Mafia AU Bobby is a crime boss who runs a diner that doesn't open, as a front. Hen, Chimney, and Eddie work for him. Buck, who is a college student studying to become a teacher, comes to this diner to study for his exam, as it is quiet and no one bothers him. This company "adopts" Buck and Maddie. The fanfiction is finished, and there's only one chapter. 2. Buck was taken away from his family because he wasn't being fed or cared for. Buck and his foster parents went to Minnesota for Christmas, and he got lost in a supermarket. Buck ended up at a fire station, where Bobby found him and later adopted him. Buck lives happily with Bobby's family. When he gets older, he goes on a trip and meets Eddie, who is training in the army. They start dating. Eddie finds out about Christopher and breaks up with Buck without saying why. A few years later, Eddie comes to work at 118 and meets Buck again. The fanfiction is complete and has 4 chapters. Thanks

entry.title: I Can Talk You Through Phone Sex..."Platonically"
entry.summary:
Author: ThistleFirethorn

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,000Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 156

Summary: "Buck, I am not calling and paying a stranger for phone sex, just to release some pent-up tension." Eddie's voice was a mix of embarrassment and irritation. "Well, you wouldn't have to pay me," Buck said casually. "W-what?" Eddie's heart skipped a beat, his hand tightening around the phone. "...you?" "Yeah, why not. You know I don't know how to shut up, so it's not like I would run out of things to say." Buck said with a laugh, trying to ease the tension. "I can talk you through it."

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 66,262Chapters: 11/?Kudos: 12

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn‚Äôt end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they‚Äôre reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn‚Äôt be more different. She‚Äôs the disciplined ‚Äúgood girl‚Äù with her future mapped out, while he‚Äôs the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. Summary: Evan knows that wish babies are extremely rare, the Fae only grant a handful of wishes per year and almost never to single parents. But Evan so desperately wants a family to love that he‚Äôs been subconsciously wishing since he was a teenager. Eddie hadn‚Äôt thought of wishing for a baby, he had barely heard of wish babies or soulmates, his parents didn‚Äôt believe in such things. Eddie desperately wanted a place for him and his son to belong, a family that would accept him without demanding that he change who he was to fit their impossibly unrealistic expectations.

entry.title: They kept me quiet, but you gave me a reason to speak again
entry.summary:
Author: Buddieforever1111

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,118Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 31

Summary: If he stays quiet, no one can ask him questions he‚Äôs never going to be able to answer. It‚Äôs better for him to be quiet since his mind is never quiet. It‚Äôs a never-ending cycle of awful flashbacks and memories he would rather forget about. If he had the option to erase the last almost 9 years of his life, then maybe he wouldn‚Äôt feel so destroyed, and that‚Äôs how he feels. He doesn‚Äôt know how to describe it other than that it completely and totally destroyed him from the inside out. His teammates won‚Äôt understand, no one will. Or... entry.title: The Devil's on the Loose
entry.summary:
Author: audioaujom

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,219Chapters: 3/15Kudos: 31

Summary: In the back of the ambulance, Eddie was in the middle of rechecking vitals for the injured patient when he suddenly heard the sirens stop wailing, immediately jolting up from what he was doing. ‚ÄúWhat the hell‚Ä¶?‚ÄùWhen Eddie looked up he saw the glint off the metal of the gun the guard with him was holding, gaze instantly locking onto the threat. His hands over the patient stilled, and his eyes narrowed into a glare. It was made worse when he recognized the eyes he was glaring into, his anger too strong for his rising panic to bother him at all.‚ÄúHey there, Eddie.‚Äù The man grinned, taking his hat off as the disguise was no longer doing him any good. ‚ÄúMiss me?‚Äù‚Äú...Axel.‚Äù Eddie greeted, teeth clenched so hard he could feel pain in his jaw.Axel just continued to smile, the gesture menacing. ‚Äú‚ÄòCause I certainly missed you.‚ÄùWelcome to LA!Here you'll find a canon-divergent 9-1-1 AU where Buck and Eddie get abducted during the prison riot and have both their situation and their feelings to deal with.This is a direct sequel to I'm Down, Bleeding Out, Begging for the Bell, but reading of it is not required.Updates Thursdays!

entry.title: giggle
entry.summary:
Author: paleredheadinascifi

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,110Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 489

Summary: A giggle bursts out of him before he can stop it. An actual, genuine giggle. It lands as more of a strangled, choking wheeze, given that he slaps his hand over his mouth to muffle it as it escapes.He can recognize that it‚Äôs probably impolite to laugh in a moment like this. Unfortunately, it appears he has the giggles.¬†Or, it's really late, and Buck and Eddie have the giggles.
